description:
The true masterminds behind everything that happened appear before Hikaru and Alma and they end up being ARMS` leader Aljis, and his Mecha-Ude, Fist. And underneath Aljis`s mask, they discover it`s actually Yakumo, who should`ve died 100 years ago. What are they truly after? The curtain rises on Hikaru and Alma`s final battle to determine the fate of all the Mecha-Udes and the Mecha-Ude users!
Source: Crunchyroll
